errors.error_description: Invalid pip command syntax using -r flag with a non-existent requirements file path
correction_candidates: Fix the command to 'pip install iris-grib' for standard installation
Use 'pip install -r requirements.txt' if a requirements file exists in the root
Change to 'pip install --requirement requirements.txt' using the full flag name
errors.golden_answer: Fix the command to 'pip install iris-grib' for standard installation
